name: DeepChat
description: A fully free desktop smart assistant, with a powerful DeepSeek large model, supporting multi-round conversations, internet search, file uploads, knowledge bases, and more.

content.overview: DeepChat is a fully free desktop smart assistant that connects powerful AI capabilities to your personal world. Featuring the DeepSeek large language model, it offers multi-round conversations, internet search capabilities, file uploads, knowledge bases and more. The interface is designed to be user-friendly and efficient, with features like multi-channel chat concurrency support.

features.title: Multiple Model Support
features.description: Supports multiple model cloud services including DeepSeek, OpenAI, Silicon Flow, etc., and local model deployment via Ollama

features.title: Multi-Channel Chat
features.description: Concurrent conversation support allows switching to other chats without waiting for model responses

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Available on Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms

features.title: Markdown Rendering
features.description: Complete Markdown rendering with excellent code module visualization

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Intuitive interface with a complete guide page for immediate productivity

useCases.title: Personal Assistant
useCases.description: Helps with daily tasks, information lookup, and organization through natural conversations

useCases.title: Research Tool
useCases.description: Assists with gathering information, analyzing data, and exploring topics through intelligent search capabilities

useCases.title: Learning Aid
useCases.description: Helps explain complex concepts, answer questions, and provide educational content

advantages: Powerful DeepSeek large language model integration

faqs.question: How do I install DeepChat?
faqs.answer: You can download the latest release from the GitHub repository for your platform (Windows, macOS, or Linux), or build it from source following the development instructions.

faqs.question: Does DeepChat require an internet connection?
faqs.answer: For cloud-based models like DeepSeek and OpenAI, an internet connection is required. However, local models through Ollama can be used offline once downloaded.

faqs.question: Is DeepChat open source?
faqs.answer: Yes, DeepChat is an open-source project available on GitHub under the Apache-2.0 license.
